text: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: The real measure of your wealth is how much you'd be worth if you lost all your money.
author: Unknown

text: Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.
author: Warren Buffett

text: Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant.
author: P.T. Barnum

text: Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

text: The only difference between a rich person and a poor person is how they use their time.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

text: Too many people spend money they earned to buy things they don't want to impress people they don't like.
author: Will Rogers

text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The goal isn’t more money. The goal is living life on your terms.
author: Chris Brogan

text: Wealth is not about having a lot of money; it’s about having a lot of options.
author: Chris Rock

text: The stock market is a device for transferring money from the impatient to the patient.
author: Warren Buffett

text: Money doesn’t buy happiness, but it does buy freedom.
author: Unknown

text: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
author: Plato

text: You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will forever control you.
author: Dave Ramsey

text: It’s not how much money you make, but how much money you keep.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

text: Don’t work for money; make it work for you.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

text: The best way to become wealthy is to create value for others.
author: Unknown

text: Rich people have small TVs and big libraries, and poor people have small libraries and big TVs.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

text: Wealth is not his that has it, but his that enjoys it.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: If you don’t find a way to make money while you sleep, you will work until you die.
author: Warren Buffett

text: Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
author: Ayn Rand

text: The habit of saving is itself an education; it fosters every virtue, teaches self-denial, cultivates the sense of order.
author: T.T. Munger

text: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
author: Jim Rohn

text: The rich invest in time, the poor invest in money.
author: Warren Buffett

text: A budget is telling your money where to go instead of wondering where it went.
author: Dave Ramsey

text: The more you learn, the more you earn.
author: Warren Buffett

text: Wealth flows from energy and ideas.
author: William Feather

text: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

text: Money grows on the tree of persistence.
author: Japanese Proverb

text: The fastest way to double your money is to fold it and put it back in your pocket.
author: Will Rogers

text: Financial peace isn’t the acquisition of stuff. It’s learning to live on less than you make.
author: Dave Ramsey

text: Opportunities come infrequently. When it rains gold, put out the bucket, not the thimble.
author: Warren Buffett

text: Wealth is the product of a man’s capacity to think.
author: Ayn Rand

text: The way to wealth is as plain as the way to market. It depends chiefly on two words: industry and frugality.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: If you want to be financially free, you need to become a different person than you are today.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

text: The best investment you can make is in yourself.
author: Warren Buffett

text: Money is a great servant but a bad master.
author: Francis Bacon

text: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
author: Epictetus

text: The key to making money is to stay invested.
author: Suze Orman

text: Buy when everyone else is selling, and hold until everyone else is buying.
author: J. Paul Getty

text: The secret to wealth is simple: Find a way to do more for others than anyone else does.
author: Tony Robbins

text: It’s not your salary that makes you rich; it’s your spending habits.
author: Charles A. Jaffe

text: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
author: Harry Golden

text: Wealth is not about what you have, but what you do with what you have.
author: Unknown

text: The greatest return on investment is the knowledge you gain.
author: Unknown

text: A penny saved is a penny earned.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The man who does more than he is paid for will soon be paid for more than he does.
author: Napoleon Hill

text: Financial freedom is a mental, emotional, and educational process.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb
